data.name: Taskmaster
data.description: A master of combat mimicry, Taskmaster uses his skill to steal positive effects from enemies.

starItems.name: Taskmaster
starItems.description: A master of combat mimicry, Taskmaster uses his skill to steal positive effects from enemies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from primary target to self.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from primary target to self.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Transfer <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.
Transfer <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from primary target to self.

4.description:

Transfer <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from primary target to self.

Transfer <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from primary target to self.

Transfer <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects

Transfer <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from primary target to self.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.
Transfer <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from primary target to self.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. This attack gains +<color=#86e619>300%</color> Extra Focus.
Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> additional target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> additional targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. This attack gains +<color=#86e619>300%</color> Extra Focus.
Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> additional targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> additional targets

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies, this attack cannot be counterattacked.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies, this attack cannot be counterattacked.

+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional targets

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies, this attack cannot be counterattacked.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. This attack gains +<color=#86e619>300%</color> Extra Focus.
Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies, this attack cannot be counterattacked.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to primary target.
Bonus attack all targets with <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more non-summoned <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> extra Focus for this ability.
This attack is Unavoidable.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>  and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to primary target. Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy.
Bonus attack all targets with <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more non-summoned <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> extra Focus for this ability.
This attack is Unavoidable.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random enemies
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to all targets with <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>  and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to primary target. Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random enemies.
Bonus attack all targets with <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more non-summoned <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> extra Focus for this ability.
This attack is Unavoidable.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to primary target and <color=#86e619>1</color> random secondary target

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>  and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to primary target and <color=#86e619>1</color> random secondary target. Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random enemies.
Bonus attack all targets with <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more non-summoned <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> extra Focus for this ability.
This attack is Unavoidable.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing to all targets with <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>  and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to primary target and <color=#86e619>1</color> random secondary target. Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to <color=#86e619>2</color> random enemies.
Bonus attack all targets with <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more non-summoned <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> extra Focus for this ability.
This attack is Unavoidable.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to all enemies

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>  and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to primary target and <color=#86e619>1</color> random secondary target. Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.
Bonus attack all targets with <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more non-summoned <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> extra Focus for this ability.
This attack is Unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to all targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to primary target and <color=#86e619>2</color> random secondary targets
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>  and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to all enemies

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>  and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to primary target and <color=#86e619>2</color> random secondary targets. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, instead, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>  and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to all enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.
Bonus attack all targets with <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more non-summoned <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> extra Focus for this ability.
This attack is Unavoidable.

1.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
<color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> on each <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color> or <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally's turn.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block Chance. Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Block Amount.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to Counterattack + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per non-summoned, <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color> or <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> enemy.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > On Spawn, fill Speed Bar for self and all <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color> and <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies by <color=#86e619>10%</color> + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color> or <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally.
 >  On turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color> or <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to enemy with highest Damage.
  - This is unavoidable
  - Gain +<color=#86e619>10,000%</color> Extra Focus for this
 >  Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to assist allies on non-attack abilities.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage for self and <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage for self, <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color>, and <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, +<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to assist allies on non-attack abilities

2.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
<color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> on each <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color> or <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally's turn.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block Chance. Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Block Amount.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to Counterattack + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per non-summoned, <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color> or <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> enemy.
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color> and <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > On Spawn, fill Speed Bar for self and all <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color> and <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies by <color=#86e619>10%</color> + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color> or <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally.
 >  On turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color> or <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to enemy with highest Damage.
  - This is unavoidable
  - Gain +<color=#86e619>10,000%</color> Extra Focus for this
 >  Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to assist allies on non-attack abilities.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage for self and <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Block Chance

3.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
<color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> on each <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color> or <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally's turn.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Block Chance. Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Block Amount.

  - This is unavoidable
  - Gain +<color=#86e619>10,000%</color> Extra Focus for this
 >  Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to assist allies on non-attack abilities.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage for self and <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage for self and <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color> allies
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, always assist allies on non-attack abilities

4.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
<color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> on each <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color> or <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally's turn.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:

Always gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> on each <color=#fff568>MERCENARY VILLAIN</color> or <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally's turn
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Block Chance
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to Counterattack for self and per <color=#fff568>MERCENARY</color> or <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally

On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
